description: Erection of single-storey side and porch extensions. Hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions with installation of 2no front roof light to facilitate loft conversion
decision_conditions: The proposed side extension would extend beyond a wall which fronts a highway and forms a side elevation of the original dwellinghouse, in conflict with Paragraph A.1 (e)(ii) of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The applicant has failed to demonstrate that the proposed rooflights would not protrude more than 0.15 metres beyond the plane of the slope of the original roof when measured from the perpendicular with the external surface of the original roof, in conflict with Paragraph C.1 (b) of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

A part of the proposed porch extension would be more than 3 metres above ground level, in conflict with Paragraph D.1 (c) of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

A part of the proposed porch extension would be within 2 metres of any boundary of the curtilage of the dwellinghouse with a highway, in conflict with Paragraph D.1 (d) of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
